events.message: I recently received my order but the product was not what I expected. I want to request a refund because it doesn’t match the description on your site.
System has categorized this customer inquiry under the Refund cluster based on the keywords in the message.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the customer's recent order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to assist you with your refund request and ensure we resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and specify the reason you want a refund so that I can review your case further?
My order number is 123456789. The product was a different color than shown in the pictures and it doesn’t function as advertised.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund for your order or offer an exchange if you prefer. Please let me know which option suits you best.
I would prefer a refund, thank you. Please proceed with it as soon as possible.
Your refund has been initiated and should reflect in your account within 5 to 7 business days. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Closing this case as the refund issue appears fully resolved per your confirmation. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
